sentences.english: The price of the books includes postage and packing.
sentences.chinese: 书籍的价格包括邮费和包装费。

sentences.english: Please contact customer service for purchase more than 5 pieces.
sentences.chinese: 欲知五件以上的邮费请联系客服。

sentences.english: Third, the postage was high at that time.
sentences.chinese: 第三，那时候邮费很高，邮递员要收邮资很困难。

sentences.english: If the buyer had insisted back, then take at least one postage.
sentences.chinese: 如果买家非要退得话，那至少得承担一次邮费。

sentences.english: Minimum order amount in wholesales cost and not inclusive of shipping charges.
sentences.chinese: 最少订购额是依批发价计算与不包括邮费在内。

sentences.english: Please quote your price on FOB basis, indicating the postage for dispatch by parcel post to Shaihai via Guangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 请报船上交货价，并说明将包裹经广州至上海的邮费。

sentences.english: All right, here is the money. You can keep the change.
sentences.chinese: 好的，这是邮费，找的钱你留着吧。

sentences.english: He spent $150 plus shipping and tax.
sentences.chinese: 他一共花费了150美元的邮费与税。

sentences.english: You know, postage and real paper.
sentences.chinese: 你知道，真正的纸张和邮费。

sentences.english: Postcards should be stamped on the front, or they will be seen as unpaid.
sentences.chinese: 明信片上的邮票应该贴在正面，否则视为未付邮费。

sentences.english: This dictionary is 100 yuan, postage included.
This can be done provided that the cost, airfreight and insurance premium are for buyers account.
sentences.chinese: 但布价航邮费及保险费须由客户负担。

sentences.english: No need to pay postage, no hidden costs etc. I'll pay for it all.
sentences.chinese: 无需支付邮费，没有任何隐藏费用等我会付出一切。

sentences.english: The fees include the postage and will not be refunded.
sentences.chinese: 考试费一律不退，报名费中包括邮费。

sentences.english: You will need a printer and postage.
sentences.chinese: 您将需要一台打印机和邮费。

definition: to return merchandise/to withdraw a product
to return a product for another item
